name: Painkiller: Special Edition
summary:
A very specific release of Painkiller that only contains 12 levels.
Crank up the intesity as you blast your way through 12 levels of mayhem and more than 75 species of Hell's wildest incarnations. Experience frantic action and wicked weapons: fire your stakegun and pin you enemies to the walls, or lob a grenade to send them flying!
